long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IGSave is a reliable tool developed for Instagram enthusiasts that facilitates downloading Instagram content like videos, stories, photos, reels, and profiles with ease.

IGSave is a utility with a simple interface and powerful features, helping you easily preserve your favorite moments on Instagram.

Key highlights of IGSave:
ðŸ‘‰ Video Downloader: Download Instagram videos in the highest quality available, including up to 4K resolution.
ðŸ‘‰ Photo Downloader: Capture Instagram photos in their original full size with just a few simple clicks.
ðŸ‘‰ Story Downloader: Easily save Instagram Stories and Highlights to view later.
ðŸ‘‰ Profile Downloader: Retrieve Instagram profile photos in stunning HD quality.

How to use IGSave on Chrome browser?

-Launch your Chrome browser and navigate to Instagram.com.
-Locate the desired photo or video you want to download.
-Click the "Download" button located in the top right corner of the Photo or Video.
-A new tab will open, displaying the content you intend to download. Simply save it directly to your device.
Important reminder:

When installing the extension, make sure to refresh the tab containing the video or photo you want to download to enable IGSave to detect the file correctly.

We appreciate your feedback and suggestions to improve the performance of the extension! Please contact us with any concerns or ideas for improvement.
